page.title: 19ROADS IN OUR AREA
page.content: Wallisdown Rd. is the busiest. Juggernauts, lorries, buses, vans, cars, motor-bikes and bicycles travel along it from Poole to Bournemouth. There aren't many major roads which means lorries of all shapes and sizes have to go along small roads to deliver to the shops. A new road is now being built from Alderney towards Ferndown, this will affect Talbot Woods. This road will be called the Winton and Moordown Relief Road.It will cost Â£5 million. Frost damages road surfaces and causes ruts and humps to appear and the roads frequently need repairing. Drivers need a road fund licence which costs Â£90 for a year and this money should be used to repair roads.The majority of the roads in the area are residential roads and cars are parked outside the houses.
